Author: Anders
Content: if my maths is correct:  If there is no rogue, we get to MYLO after 3 mis-sacks, whereas it will be LYLO if there is a rogue.  This is assuming no prevented night kills by chancellor

Author: Anders
Content: The difference between LYLO and MYLO is smaller than the difference between MYLO and LYLO-1.  So that may be weak evidence in favor of existence, since setup is such that adding the role has less impact on balance than it would with an odd number of players

Author: Anders
Content: I don't think it is crazy to refuse to answer about who you find suspicious on day 1. Everything is essentially noise. I also don't think a wolf would actively push for a pr reveal, it is too risky (unless they genuinely thought it was a good strategy for town and are trying to get credit for it).

Author: Anders
Content: In general, I prefer sacking inactive players on day 1. I will try my best to be more active. Right now I have a blitz game against singletee in 10 mins though

Author: Anders
Content: I am inexperienced and may be wrong, but I think on day 1, wolves are unlikely to do anything highly suspicious. There is no need, it would be bad play. So we have mostly noise, and if people are forced into reading tealeaves and saying who they find suspicious, we get a vicious circle where villagers on day 2 find each other suspicious because of their incorrect suscpicions that they were forced to make public on day 1

Author: Anders
Content: can we discuss the timetable for this sac? Will enough people be awake at deadline? If not, do americans sacrifice without europeans in their evening?  Or do we try to sacrifice today 11pm utc?
